actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Border, Maritime, and Global Counterterrorism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Border, Maritime, and Global Counterterrorism

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to require delivery by United States mail of any transportation security card issued to an individual who resides in a remote location.

summary.text: TWIC Delivery Act of 2010 - Directs the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to deliver biometric transportation security cards by U.S. mail to individuals who reside in a location where the nearest transportation security card enrollment center is not accessible by a state or federal road or is more than 100 miles away.

titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to require delivery by United States mail of any transportation security card issued to an individual who resides in a remote location.
